# CheeseMap Project Instructions

## Project Overview
CheeseMap is a France-only cheese discovery platform and B2B SaaS application built with Next.js 14, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14 (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Prisma + PostgreSQL
- NextAuth
- Mapbox
- Stripe

## Development Guidelines
- All code must be in TypeScript with strict types
- Use Tailwind CSS for all styling
- Follow App Router conventions
- Implement role-based access control
- France-only geofencing for maps and businesses
- API-first architecture for future mobile app support
